name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 2, it was reported online that a person in Nanchang, Jiangxi, bought a "Happy 8" seven-choice lottery ticket with a bet of 50,000 times the number of "40, 41, 42, 44, 63, 64, 65", and successfully won 50,000 times the cumulative prize of 200 million yuan.
On December 4, the media reported that a lottery store in Xihu District, Nanchang confirmed the authenticity of the incident.
The Jiangxi Welfare Lottery Issuing Center stated that no one has redeemed the prize yet, so it is impossible to verify the relevant details.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that the inspection of Huapeng Dong'an Community found that there was serious shoddy work. There should be 16 steel bars in a beam, but only 7 were found. The appraisal company did not dare to issue a report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, it was reported online that a head teacher of Chengbei Junior High School in Huixian City, Xinxiang, Henan Province, notified a parent of the fees in a group chat. A parent asked about the fees and was warned by a robot that someone had violated anti-fraud keywords. The head teacher then kicked the parent out of the group chat. The school responded that the anti-fraud robot kicked the parent out because the information he posted triggered sensitive words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from an employee of the civil aviation system:
The entire system is now in a state of panic, and it is not surprising that the source of the photo is being traced.
The company's statistics this year also show that safety indicators have declined year-on-year. According to the accident iceberg theory, these large and small hidden dangers are brewing very likely accidents. This is an objective law that cannot be changed by human will.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Adults' defenses break in an instant"
A netizen was sick and wanted to eat something delicious, so he ordered a bowl of Yang Guofu Spicy Hot Pot, but found that it was all synthetic meat, and his defense broke instantly.
As a result, the merchant replied that he should pay attention to his mentality, which caused the netizen to break his defense again, accusing Yang Guofu of using fresh ingredients in overseas branches, but selling synthetic meat in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Now the Bodhisattva is speechless"
On December 4, the media reported that Heytea was summoned for questioning on the grounds of "suspected violation of the Regulations on the Administration of Religious Affairs" because its milk tea packaging was printed with sculpture images such as the "Speechless Bodhisattva" that have recently become popular in China.
It is reported that this product is a joint product of Heytea and the China Ceramics Museum.

Netizen: This theme sends a clear signal to everyone: We are all descendants of dragons, but some dragons are dragons above dragons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 5, an international seminar to "commemorate the 75th anniversary of the publication of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights" was held in Beijing. Foreign Minister Wang Yi said at the meeting: Facts have proved that the human rights development path chosen by China is in line with China's national conditions and in line with the wishes of the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4, Tianjin. Some parents reported that the mattresses given to their children at Tianjin Hengshi Senior High School were filled with weeds. The parents who found out the truth were emotional and could not accept it, saying that they spent more than 3,000 yuan for their children to sleep on this.
The school responded that it was investigating the matter and could not disclose the details.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today's summary of wage-demanding submissions:
Hongxing Construction Group in Jilin City, Jilin Province, owes wages, and workers hold banners at the company gate to demand wages and defend their rights.
In Yinchuan, Ningxia, dozens of workers hold banners to demand wages, and the banners read: The rights of migrant workers must be protected, we want to live, and we want to celebrate the New Year
Jinghu Tianxi in Songyuan City, Jilin Province, owes workers wages, and workers hold banners at the sales office gate to demand wages.
Pingshan New District Government in Shenzhen, Guangdong, migrant workers lie on the ground to demand wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, 2022, Shanghai announced that from 0:00 on December 5, nucleic acid tests will no longer be required when taking public transportation in the city, including rail transit, ground buses, and ferries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The urban management of Yichun City, Jiangxi Province was questioned for drunk enforcement, and the on-site question was asked: Is drinking a glass of beer also considered drinking? 
On December 4, Taiyang Town, Gao'an City, Yichun City, Jiangxi Province. A truck driver posted a video saying that he was fined 100 yuan by the urban management on the same day because the large truck was suspected of illegally entering the town. The truck driver in question, Mr. Jin, said that the receipt was organized by the village, but the payment was collected using a personal payment code. In addition, after Mr. Jin questioned the other party's drunk enforcement, the on-site law enforcement officer asked back: Is drinking a bottle of beer also considered drunk enforcement? 
On December 5, the Gao'an City Joint Investigation Bureau issued a notice that the situation was true and the urban management involved had been suspended for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At around 6:00 on December 4, an explosion occurred in a garage in a residential area in Linhai City, Taizhou, Zhejiang.
The pots, pans, bicycles and other items in the garage were blown out of the door, the rolling shutter doors of the three garages next door were deformed, and the vehicles parked at the door were also affected.
Witnesses said that the owner usually cooked in the garage where the accident occurred, and the accident was suspected to be caused by a gas leak.
At around 17:00, the local fire rescue team said that one person was injured in the explosion and was sent to the hospital for treatment and was not in danger of life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 3, media reported that the Shaoyang Intermediate People's Court of Hunan Province recently issued an announcement stating that a teacher had been executed for raping five female students for a long time between 2016 and 2010, causing three of them to suffer from mental illness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed: Current housing prices in Beijing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 4, media reported that China had lifted most of its sanctions against Lithuania.
In 2021, Lithuania was subject to Chinese economic and trade sanctions for insisting on setting up a representative office in the name of "Taiwan", but Lithuania insisted on not compromising.
Zhao Lijian once said, let's wait and see.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 5, the media reported that Huang Siping, deputy director of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Chenzhou City, Hunan Province, and secretary of the Rucheng County Party Committee, was reported to have fallen into the river and died.
According to many local insiders, on December 4, Huang Siping came to Haotou Township from the county seat for research. At about 1 pm after lunch, Huang Siping got off the car near the Huamu Bridge Reservoir in the lower reaches of the Xujiang River, came to the riverside dozens of meters away, and then fell into the river.
A staff member of the Rucheng County Propaganda Department told the Southern Metropolis Daily reporter that "everything is inconvenient to disclose" and said that there will be an official announcement later.

content:
Netizen contribution
The children's hospitalization department of Anyang Maternal and Child Health Hospital in Henan Province has added beds in the corridor

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Shenzhen issued a policy to regulate the prices of water, electricity and heating
However, many netizens said that although the landlords lowered the water and electricity fees, they now added this part of the money back by collecting maintenance fees and increasing the rent.
Netizens said that the high water and electricity prices in Shenzhen's peasant houses seem to have formed a certain kind of convention. In fact, the real rent price is the rent + the higher part of the water and electricity fees.
Now the government requires the regulation of water and electricity fees, which actually reduces their rental income. Some sub-landlords will increase the water and electricity fees to make a profit, so they will add it back from other places under various pretexts, and also increase the charges such as elevator usage fees. There are also many people who have always doubted the accuracy of their water and electricity meters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A university in Jiangxi Province mobilized students to fill out a graduate survey questionnaire. The student ID number was provided by the school.

content: On December 4, due to the economic downturn and the continued decline in market demand, Dali Chuantong Tempered Glass in Nanhai District, Foshan, Guangdong issued a holiday notice for three months.
